title: Club tag not showing?
body: Maybe it's just me. But I formed a club early when it came out. Then clubs went offline and came back after the championship week. But now as the leader of the club I'm actually not in it nor does it show the tag I previously made. But my friends in the club are currently in it and say I'm in but I don't have a tag associated when I play a game or when hovered and I cannot be invited. Any others experiencing the same problem?

replies.body: This is a current issue with clubs that popped up after the re-enable. We're working on a fix and will deploy it when it's ready. I cannot provide an ETA on when it will be ready, but if you have any other questions, please let me know.
Im still having the same issue. It's been like that since the re-enable. Update?
I still have the same problem, even though I left my old club and joined a new one.

A buddy of mine suggested this and it surprisingly worked. Have someone invite you to a different club (do not leave yours) and put that club's tag on, then the option to put yours on should be there. It seems that the bug tells the game that you already have the tag on. Not sure why it only affects the owner, but i think that's what the bug is.
this is same for me. I am owner of a club and the "show this club tag" option is greyed and I can't select it
Hello. I created my first club yesterday. and i see our teametags in Lancher chat but in Loading screen and in game they are not there. ANd i cant fix it can u Help out ?
You can email them a support ticket with screenshots that your missing from the club. or if your friends are in it they can also take a pic to show a comparison.
